description: Unit tests for the CalculatorTools class, testing various arithmetic and mathematical operations, initialization configurations, error handling, and edge cases.

methods.name: calculator_tools
methods.description: Fixture creating a CalculatorTools instance with all operations enabled.

methods.name: basic_calculator_tools
methods.description: Fixture creating a CalculatorTools instance with only basic operations.

methods.name: test_initialization_with_selective_operations
methods.description: Tests initialization of CalculatorTools with specific operations enabled.

methods.name: test_initialization_with_all_operations
methods.description: Tests initialization of CalculatorTools with all operations enabled.

methods.name: test_add_operation
methods.description: Tests the add method of CalculatorTools.

methods.name: test_subtract_operation
methods.description: Tests the subtract method of CalculatorTools.

methods.name: test_multiply_operation
methods.description: Tests the multiply method of CalculatorTools.

methods.name: test_divide_operation
methods.description: Tests the divide method of CalculatorTools, including division by zero.

methods.name: test_exponentiate_operation
methods.description: Tests the exponentiate method of CalculatorTools.

methods.name: test_factorial_operation
methods.description: Tests the factorial method of CalculatorTools.

methods.name: test_is_prime_operation
methods.description: Tests the is_prime method of CalculatorTools.

methods.name: test_square_root_operation
methods.description: Tests the square_root method of CalculatorTools.

methods.name: test_basic_calculator_has_only_basic_operations
methods.description: Verifies that a basic calculator only includes basic operations.

methods.name: test_error_logging
methods.description: Checks that errors are properly logged during invalid operations.

methods.name: test_large_numbers
methods.description: Tests calculator operations with large input values.

methods.name: test_division_exception_handling
methods.description: Tests handling of exceptions during division.
